code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getRules}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RuleList=()=>{const[rules,setRules]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchRules=async()=>{try{const fetchedRules=await getRules();setRules(fetchedRules);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching rules:',error);}};fetchRules();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:rules.map(rule=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:rule.name}),": ",rule.description]},rule.id))});};export default RuleList;
